metadata.title: CVE-2024-47662 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  drm/amd/display: Remove register from DCN35 DMCUB diagnostic collection  [Why] These registers should not be read from driver and triggering the security violation when DMCUB work times out and diagnostics are collected blocks Z8 entry.  [How] Remove the register read from DCN35.
